艗艗艗

Related Character(s): 舟, 益, 盤
Связанный символ (и): лодка, выгода, тарелка

艗字的基本解释

艗
yì
〔艗艏（
sh弖 ）〕船头。因古代富贵人家常在船头画鷁（一种水鸟）形而得名。亦作“艗首”。

艗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》五歷切，入錫，疑。］
亦作“榏1”。
(1)船。
(2)见“艗首”。

艗字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舟字部】　艗； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1012第09
【廣韻】五歷切【集韻】【韻會】倪歷切，?音鷁。【廣韻】艗舟，舟頭爲鷁首。【揚子·方言】船首謂之閤閭，或謂之艗艏。【註】鷁，鳥名也。今江東貴人船前作靑雀，是其象也。鷁，音亦。【司馬相如·子虛賦】浮文鷁，揚旌栧。【正字通】晉王濬造大舟，畫鷁鳥怪獸於船首以懼江神。本作鷁，後人因名舟爲艗。　又【集韻】宜戟切，音逆。義同。

艗字的源字形

字源演变：

金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
艗字的起名意思

船。

bow of a Chinese boat
Basic explanation of words
bow of a Chinese boat
yì
〔艗艏(
sh弖)] the bow. It is named after the ancient rich and wealthy people often painted the shape of a bird (a kind of water bird) on the bow of the ship. Also known as "the first one".
bow of a Chinese boat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" five calendar cuts, into the tin, doubt. ]
Also known as "榏1".
(1) Ship.
(2) See "艗首".
bow of a Chinese boat
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Zhou Zi Department] 　艗; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1012 Page 09
[Guangyun] Five Liqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Ni Liqie,? Yin 鹢. [Guangyun] The boat head is the head of the boat. 【Yangtze Dialect】The bow of the ship is called Helu, or stern. [Note] 鹢, also the name of the bird. Today, the Jiangdong nobleman is a bird in front of the ship, which is also the same.鹢, the sound is also. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】Floating Wenshu, Yang Jingjian. 【Zhengzitong】The king of Jin made a big boat, and painted a bird and a monster on the bow to fear the god of the river. This is a scorpion, and later generations are sacred because of the name of the boat.　[Jiyun] It is suitable to cut with a halberd, and the sound is reversed. The same meaning.
